The Other Side of 9 ¾

Hello world, this is the owner of Honeydukes @ Hogsmeade Jianing. I’m a CmpE student at Vanderbilt University. I live multiple lives.

  • Developer
  • Art history lover/Freelance artist
  • Bibliophile
  • Gamer
  • Story writer, occasionally
  • Wanderlust
  • Undergrad researcher @ STORM Lab

I have a passion for art (& its history) and technology, because I appreciate and (at least try to) make amazing things. Michelangelo, Monet and Arthur Rackham are my favorite artists. Meanwhile I’m looking into CS graduate programs and trying to figure out what interests me most.
